description: Ms. codex. Title from leaf 1a. Physical description: 30 lines per page; written in small naskh in black on glazed, laid Arabic paper. Rubrication and catchwords. Occasional staining. Origin: Likely 17th century. Incipit: الحمد لله ... ىقول ... الحر العاملى ... کتاب الصلوة
author: Ḥurr al-ʻĀmilī, Muḥammad ibn al-Ḥasan, 1624-1693
abstract: Collection of ḥadīths concerned with legal topics; contains Kitāb al-ṣalāh; incomplete at end.
alternative: كتاب تفصيل وسائل الشيعة الى تحصيل مسائل الشريعة
extent: 186 leaves : paper ; 307 x 189 (236 x 118) mm bound to 307 x 191 mm
title: al-Juzʼ al-thānī min Kitāb Tafṣīl wasāʼil al-Shīʻah ilá taḥṣīl masāʼil al-sharīʻah.
uniform title: تفصيل وسائل الشيعة الى تحصيل مسائل الشريعة. جزء 2
creator: حر العاملي، محمد بن الحسن، 1624-1693
subject: Hadith (Shiites)—Early works to 1800
binding note: Full black leather with blind-stamped central mandorla and pendants; salmon paper doublures; spine repaired.
member of collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
